name: Unusual Negroni (Aperol, Lillet, and Gin Cocktail)
description: A lighter, mellower Negroni, made with Aperol and Lillet.
recipeIngredient: Small grapefruit slice or grapefruit twist, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: To serve on the rocks, stir Aperol, Lillet Blanc, and gin with ice in an Old Fashioned glass, then garnish with grapefruit slice and serve. To serve up, stir Aperol, Lillet Blanc, and gin with ice in a mixing glass, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with grapefruit twist.
